website_summaries.verdict: A small, portable generator that offers up to 3,000 watts of power on the go. Great for outdoor parties and construction projects where the need for power is high.
pros: Advanced monitoring capabilities will alert you if oil and gasoline are low
Several outlets to connect a number of electronic devices to the generator
cons: Power supply may be limited for larger applications

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Honda EU3000IS is a awesome little machine. This is the second one for me.. the first is 3 years old and still running strong.. It is quiet and penny pinching on gas.. small enough I can load by myself.. I added the all terrain tires for easy moving..
customer_reviews.author: michael thorley

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed how much it did
customer_reviews.text: This was the little generator that did it all! Living thru Hurricane Irma was tough until we received this generator. This was able to power so much in my home; the fridge, fans, lights, a window air conditioner, the washing machine when we needed and our phones and computers. I was amazed how much it did! We ran it continuously for 80 hours without a problem. When topped off with gas, we could get about 11 hours of power, more than enough time to get a cool nights sleep in oppressive heat and exhaustion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weight is almost double what is listed on the site.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I am sure it will work as described but Amazon, you have got to get your product information correct! This is listed as weighing about 75 pounds dry on your site. It really weighs over 130 pounds dry. Add 3.5 gallons of gas plus oil and I am probably looking at 160 pounds! I'm not the smallest guys around but I sure am no weight lifter. Had a heck of a time getting this into the bed of my pickup. I'll be buying the wheel kit and a ramp but this would have been good to know BEFORE I took delivery of it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint_R

customer_reviews.title: Pleased With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Started right up and ran flawlessly. I live in hurricane country, where a generator can mean the difference between a good nights sleep or lying awake bathed in sweat. I've heard nothing but good things about Honda generators, from people who have come to count on quality workmanship. As Hurricane Harvey moved toward the Gulf Coast I stored 25gal of marine gasoline (No ethanol) to get me through a week. Even though the manual stated gasoline with no more than 10% ethanol was ok, I believe small engines function better & last longer using only marine gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: Herrmittao

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome generators that are powerful
customer_reviews.text: We've got 3 of these things. Absolutely awesome generators that are powerful, quiet, and extremely fuel efficient. The only downside is that Honda stopped selling the parallel kit for the 3000's and we had to buy an aftermarket parallel kit from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: JW_Redlands

customer_reviews.title: A bargain for a Honda generator
customer_reviews.text: This isn't quite as quiet as the EU models but works as well otherwise and is still quieter than your typical hardware store generator. Functions perfectly. Runs for hours on little gas.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This generator was either a refurbished unit or was damaged during assembly. First, no bolts for the battery were furnished neither in the box or taped on the battery as per the instructions. However, there was tape on the battery as if someone had removed them at some point. Second, after purchasing replacement bolts, the unit would not start after following the instructions several times. It went through the troubleshooting steps and found the spark plug cap had been snapped off. The outside of the unit was not damaged so this break had to have happened during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Bradden Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Does not start with key starter, and the bracket legs are crushed.
customer_reviews.text: right out of box and I noticed the generator is not standing straight and wobbles about one inch on one side. The bracket legs with the rubber were crushed badly, seemed like the generator was dropped on one side, but the package had no noticeable damaged. I would like two replacement bracket legs and I can replace it myself or I would like to return the generator and shop somewhere else. This generator cost me over $2,300.00 and I am not happy with it. I bought this for two reasons: 1) super quite 2) key starter. I could not start the generator with key. Looks like there is a dead battery or non at all.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Something that expensive will buy locally next time
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged in four places , evidently due to shipping so we sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honda EB2800i work horse that doesn't squeal!
customer_reviews.text: Started it up after the oil fill and gas, ran for one hour. Plugged in my Airstream with breakers off. Started it up, turned AC on low, no problem, waited 10 minutes and turned AC on high. Very little increase in noise. Ran my 15000 BTU AC unit no problem. Now we are ready to go boondocking with 300watts of solar connected to three 100Ahr batteries and the HONDA EB2800i for support or AC if needed. WORKS GREAT, NO NEED TO GO TO THE 3000W for $1K more.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Selzer

customer_reviews.title: Always inspect before you store
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken spark plug cap would not start... returned
customer_reviews.author: A. Winther

customer_reviews.title: If you need a generator run your RV air conditioner don't buy this one
customer_reviews.text: This generator is not big enough to start the AC unit on my RV trailer after plugging into the generator and unplugging I finally got my air conditioner to run it was just a big pain in the ass and it's not fuel efficient when you are running the air conditioner 2.1 fuel tank not big enough I'm going to sell this and buy the Honda eu3000 it's very quiet fuel efficient it's more money but I think it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: great quality well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small back up generator,starts on 1st pull, great quality well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT GENERATOR!
customer_reviews.text: THIS HONDA IS TRULY A GREAT MACHINE. I TOOK IT OUT OF THE BOX, PUT GAS AND OIL IN IT, AND IT STARTED THE VERY FIRST CRANK. IT IS VERY QUIET AND FUEL EFFICIENT. ALSO, THE INVERTER TECHNOLOGY MAKES IT SAFE TO CHARGE ELECTRONICS. I RECOMMEND PUTTING IT ON A MOVERS DOLLY, AS IT FITS PERFECTLY ON ONE. I LIVE IN A HURRICANE AREA SO A GENERATOR IS A NECESSITY, AND THIS HONDA IS JUST WHAT I NEED.HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY A.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty sweet unit
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up to the camper and turned everything on including the AC, and this load didn't increase the decibels by any noticeable degree in eco mode. Picked up wheels at home depot to help transport. This is a pretty sweet unit! I haven't owned it long but I don't expect any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So it's the perfect size for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Started on first pull! Bought this after getting hit by Irma and its full tank (2.1 gallons) gas lasted for a litter over 16 hours on eco mode running several large fans, laptops, 55" TV, lights and other devices. So it's the perfect size for our needs. Also the we haven't experienced any electric fluctuations as yet. On the other generator that we borrowed, not only that it was loud as hell, our power surge protectors got burned and 2 of our fans broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mao

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention
customer_reviews.text: Battery was dead when it arrived. Unit kept loading out with only a couple lights attached. Customer service would not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Generator!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little generator! It's easy to set up and get started, and much quieter than other generators I've been around. I can drag it around the farm for jobs that require power tools out in the field, and it keeps my farm freezers going when the power company decides to shut our power down for days at a time. Another great feature - you can daisy chain multiple units together if you need a larger power supply. I definitely recommend getting the wheel kit for it as its a bit too heavy to move around easily without it.
customer_reviews.author: KSAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, just as I would expect from Honda
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. The controls are logical, fueling is easy, starts with no fuss (choke on), and the noise level is acceptable for a unit this size. Besides electronics chargers, lights and small fridge I've used it to power electric circular saw, jig saw and belt sander with no problems. I did install an hour meter so I could keep track of oil changes and other maintenance  Highly recommnmended!
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I spend 50$ in oil gas gas canister filters and spark plugs as extras that now im stuck with . Spend 4 hours trying to trouble shoot and drain . Never got it to work !
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Just won’t run
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in desperation after our repeated blackouts. My father is 93 and requires oxygen so we need power. It came with parts missing and is still not running. Honda has been non responsive to my questions and concerns. It’s now in a local repair shop and I’m hoping they can at least get it running. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J.

customer_reviews.title: Great generator! My only gripe is the low fuel ...
customer_reviews.text: Great generator! My only gripe is the low fuel capacity but it is very quiet and efficient. Runs the A/C on my camper no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Power outage soon after delivery. Ran power cord w 5 outlets to living room . Plugged in lights, 2 laptops. Worked great. Could have added much higher load if necessary. Next time we’ll just plug it into RV and hang out there.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J Roelle

customer_reviews.title: The perfect heavy duty tailgating generator I can run crock pots ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect heavy duty tailgating generator I can run crock pots deep fryers television and lights with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Brent sayles sr

customer_reviews.title: Not light weight
customer_reviews.text: According to the description, this generator weighs 75 pounds... that is simply not true, maybe 150? That would be much closer to the truth, otherwise, excellent product, very quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.author: Super D

customer_reviews.title: Good generator but UNDER A RECALL
customer_reviews.text: Works great but this unit is under a recall for a possible leaking carburetor. This should be disclosed in the product listing.
customer_reviews.author: F W Hough

customer_reviews.title: Old jarhead says......
customer_reviews.text: Slow, but cheap shipping, this is simply the best on the market...worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems already
customer_reviews.text: Using the generator to power my house during our PGE safety power outages. Ran fine for the first couple of days then began to shut of randomly. First it would run for an hour or two and progressed to running 2 or 3 minutes before shutting off. I use fresh gas every fill up. I spent the extra money to get the Honda and now it's off to the repair shop for who knows how long. Worth $2100? Just ordered a bigger WEN for under $800. Time will tell. Update: Oil level safety sensor was bad. Honda will cover it under warranty but 7-10 days to get the part. Counting diagnosis and repair 3 weeks in the shop.
customer_reviews.author: John Plymyer

customer_reviews.title: Oil consumption
customer_reviews.text: This is aug.5th and I have had this generator less than a month an habe used it about 25 hrs...and it is using oil. And is starting to run a little rough... but it started out fine but I'm not happy about it at this point...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price. We use this for our home we converted it to propane.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce or Lori

customer_reviews.title: Clean quiet reliable
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, quiet, quick starting, and super build quality. As an engineer, I took a scope and a few other specialized measuring instruments to the output under various loads. The sine wave is very, very, clean and the output regulation is excellent. Highly recommend the Hutch Mountain propane/nat gas conversion if you want to go that route.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Rainville

customer_reviews.title: Good Capacity generator, better with Honda Wheel Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient, can run my two refrigerators for 1.5 hours on 1 liter of fuel. Generator is pretty heavy, I bought the optional wheel kit and added it. I highly recommend the wheel kit, which makes the generator very mobile, which otherwise is heavy, bulky, and awkward to move.
customer_reviews.author: marshallrt

customer_reviews.title: Honda EU3000iS - great generator to get you through power outages.
customer_reviews.text: Honda EU3000iS This quiet, electric start, inverter generator is great. Runs almost all day on a tank of gas. Reliable. More expensive but worth it. Inverter makes pure AC so I can run anything on it, and it conserves gas under low loads. -Chris
customer_reviews.author: Christophe

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: This thing worth the money $ 999 I believe Honda tell the truth about watts most of the other generators maker lie about watts I run my house on this my 110 volts water is 3000kw and it runs it too , but that max load so I won't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tartola

customer_reviews.title: My Dad asked for a Honda generator.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Dad in northern California. He said he is very pleased. And now that he has it, there haven't been any power outages. He credits his new Honda generator for keeping the outages away. He's a hoot.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Jack’ Small Engines and the generator both get 5 Full Stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is for the generator and the seller, Jack’s Small Engines. ArrIved 3 days early, great condition. Generator runs like a champ. I expect nothing but the best from a Honda. Jack’s super fast service made this an even better experience. Ready for the hurricane season and the camping season!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and reliable. This is light weight and works great in our travel trailer. I can even run a 13.3 btu AC (equipped with easy start). I'll probably get another one of these so we can run the AC and other larger loads at the same. time.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Stiller

customer_reviews.title: Honda portable generators
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far for dry camping but it was great : it ran the a.c. by itself in our new 30 ' Jayco Jay flight travel trailer. Or it would run all other trailer items by themselves. Easy to start. Quiet. I can see this Honda 2800 watt will also be very helpful at our home during next power outage. Glad we bought it. At $999 on Amazon, it's a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honda EB3000C Perfect For The Job Site!!!
customer_reviews.text: Typical Honda Awesomeness... This generator is one of the lightest for it's size, works great, has always started on one pull. There are cheaper generators out there but Honda's are the best in my opinion. My next one will be a EU2000 inverter generator and I will buy that from amazon also.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around and lift, relatively quiet with plenty of power for my RV
customer_reviews.text: I love my Honda. I mostly use solar panels for power but I back solar up with the generator. It is reasonably quiet. I can’t sleep with it running close to the RV, but during the day I don’t notice the noise. It has plenty of power for my AC alone. I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: TDR

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Shipped it to Puerto Rico to serve during the 6 months the Island was without power. Is now being used as backup.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small generator
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to carry around, quiet, yet big enough to run my air conditioner in my motorhome
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: bought it to use as needed with my rv. 1 week after it arrived we had a 24 plus hour power outage at home. glad i bought it. ran perfect, not bad noise, ran everything i needed in my house. needles to say i am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: maj t a

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend getting the wheels as it is a two person ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, efficient. Would recommend getting the wheels as it is a two person job when trying to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K Wilmes

customer_reviews.title: New filter and it runs fine.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped upside down and had some oil in air filter. New filter and it runs fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ironhead

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Its quiet,so quiet I was impressed. Runs excellent, but its a honda you expect that. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Revuta Giesbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and dropped before arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived cracked. Scratched. Banged up. It’s a good generator, have a couple of them and love them. But they did not care about quality shipping or handling.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra S.K.

customer_reviews.title: If you want
customer_reviews.text: The best The most dependable the quietest then you want this.... it really is that simple.
customer_reviews.author: You don't need my name

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what expected. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.text: If you have trouble starting it, add more oil. Honda motors now have a oil shut off switch (which is awesome) but in order for it to be off, you have to fill it all the way up with oil initially, not just halfway. But I’ve had it for 3 months. Quiet. Still cranks up 1st pull. Sips gas.
customer_reviews.author: Trae Bagley

customer_reviews.title: We are satisfied with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time and performed as stated on line. THank you!
customer_reviews.author: CinMinGirl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very silent and powerful. Just what we needed to deal with the aftermath of Maria in Puerto Rico.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! So quiet Love, love, love this little gennie.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina L. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Honda quality.
customer_reviews.text: Of course, it's a Honda generator, so great quality and performance. Quiet and smooth. Easy to start.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M.

customer_reviews.title: Started on second pull. Used it a couple times ...
customer_reviews.text: Started on second pull. Used it a couple times so far and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: THEODORE M ZIMMERLY

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet on eco mode
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all out there and this one was best for me. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than other generators and it meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power Company Neglect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the PG&E outages in California.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  The weight info is wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: This weighs 131 lbs !!! This is a great generator, but the information given here on Amazon is very much incorrect. It does not weigh 75.7 lbs. This generator weighs 131 pounds. I bought it beliveing Amazon's information that it it only weighs 75 lbs. Now I cannot use it because it weighs 131 pounds and my small RV trailer cannot handle that much weight on a cargo carrier I bought for the back of the trailer. Very unhappy with Amazon giving this incorrect information. I have told them about this and they still have not made the correction.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet Gen set
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this Gen Set other than it's a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Chase

customer_reviews.title: Quick start and easy for the family to start
customer_reviews.text: I have two other Honda's and they are why I bought a third one, this one being larger. Quick start and easy for the family to start.
customer_reviews.author: ts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, just what I wanted, it runs my a/c in my class a motorhome
customer_reviews.author: Christine Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Solid and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Honda. What else can I say. It does exactly as advertised. Keep in mind that you have to put oil into the generator before it will start. Honda has made it fool proof and I can sometimes be a fool. If you don't have enough oil in it, it will not start. Very quiet. Surprisingly quiet
customer_reviews.author: Garrison L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Runs great and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment and outstanding quality. Runs great and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this generator! Surprised there was nothing telling you that you had to take it apart to connect the battery before first use. After I figured that out, it started right up.
customer_reviews.author: Matskee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. It met all our expectations. Does all that it claims to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can easily talk over it
customer_reviews.text: I'd be hard pressed to purchase another brand. Some people complain about having to hook up the battery and put oil in. Of course, that takes all of 2 minutes. This gen rocks! You can easily talk over it. When I walk by a food truck night and all the trucks have those chainsaw sounding generators, my son always tells me how much better he likes ours. He's a smart id.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Seller, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy workhorse for the home. Looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: P.H. Florida

customer_reviews.title: The BEST......stop looking....
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should. It is super quiet. I use it for my RV. With fridge,freezer running and a/c on constantly even used a vacuum cleaner with everything on and it is simply the best. Used it for a entire weekend and only used 7 gallons of gas. So approximately $21 to run it and stay cool and comfortable the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ONCE AGAIN, A QUALITY HONDA "QUIET" PRODUCT TO PLENTY OF POWER.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The eu3000is is the best generator super quiet. I will recommended
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Galeana

customer_reviews.title: Honda Quality at a great price.  Quiet and smooth running.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. I have owned other generators in the past but none compare to this quiet running, well built machine. It is a little heavier than I thought but it looks and feels very solid unlike those open frame noisy ones. Shipping was quick and it came undamaged and once I added oil it started up first pull. Wish I had bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Munsch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The power generator have a fuel and oil leakage problem...
customer_reviews.author: SGT VENDETTA

customer_reviews.title: Better capacity for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good size not too big to move around. Quiet. More expensive compared to competitors. banks on Honda quality
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Got off to a rough start as the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got off to a rough start as the unit is shipped with battery disconnected (good idea) but no instructions in manual telling you thishould, and spent Xtra money to have it properly attached. It's real quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get to battery very easy!! Will only start with pull start
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get to battery very easy !! Will only start with pull start !! Owners manual has NOTHING about battery !!
customer_reviews.author: james bowen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with obvious damage, no instruction manuals or paperwork ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with obvious damage, no instruction manuals or paperwork of any kind and did not run correctly. Continuously smoked when started and died when anything was plugged in. On the bright side, I had no issues getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisR

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this generator took it to the mountains did not work called Amazon several times said I was past my 30 days I'm out 2099.00 with a generator that does not work don't buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Honda EU3000iS, 2800 Running Watts/3000 Starting Watts, Gas Powered, Portable Inverter
product_meta.description: Color:RedThis popular EU3000IS can operate a wide variety of appliances, including a furnace, fridge, microwave, most 13, 500 BTU RV AC units, and much more. .
feature_bullets: Popular model can operate a wide variety of appliances, including a furnace, fridge, microwave, TV, blenders, most 13,500 BTU RV AC units and much more

Super quiet: so quiet, your neighbors will thank you; the EU3000is operates at 49 to 58 dB (A), which is less noise than a normal conversation; this makes it ideal for camping, RV power and any other activity that requires quiet operation
Fuel efficient runs up to 20 hours on 3.4 Gal. of fuel: thanks to our exclusive eco-throttle, the EU3000 offers fuel efficiency, it runs 7.2 to 20 hours on a single tank, depending on the load.

Advanced inverter technology - reliable power for computers and other sensitive equipment: Honda's inverter technology means stable, clean power in a smaller, lighter package; the precision of Honda's inverter technology ensures our inverter generators produce power that is as reliable as the power you get from your outlets at home
Protected by oil alert: this protects the generator by shutting the engine off when low oil is detected

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars230 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
